htmlBody: Hi, is there any update to this program? I've applied last month but never got any response. And if I am deemed as not suitable, is there any explanations why?
is it possible to complete training without online conferences ? because I have a low level of English and I'm not sure I can support a discussion.

Yes - the best thing to do is to sign up and work through the curriculum in your own time!

https://course.aisafetyfundamentals.com/governance
